referenceObject.reference: Jin, C., Yin, X. C. & Zhang, F. (2015). A new species of the genus Utivarachna Kishida, 1940 (Araneae: Trachelidae) from China, with the first description of the male of U. fabaria Zhao & Peng, 2014 and a redescription of U. gui (Zhu, Song & Kim, 1998). Zootaxa 4057(4): 569-581.
